1.Title: Silver Spiked Feathers
1.Description: Increases Anomaly Buildup Rate by <color=#2BAD00>40%</color>. When the equipper deals <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>, their Anomaly Proficiency increases by <color=#2BAD00>20</color> for 5s, stacking up to 6 times. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s, and repeated triggers reset the duration.
